name: nutrition
title: Nutrition
description: An extension showing the nutritional values of food, searchable with natural language queries
author: nukeop

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Nutritional Values
commands.subtitle: Show the calorie content and nutrition data of food
commands.description: Extracts nutrition information from text using natural language processing. Example queries: "3 eggs", "100g brown mushrooms", "cup of peanuts"2
